news_header: Zakaria, an 11-year-old boy from Gaza, has witnessed thousands of bodies since the war began. Instead of attending school, he volunteers at al-Aqsa hospital, helping to transport patients and assist medical staff.
news_original_title: Ambulances, school and TikTok: The lives of three children I filmed surviving Gaza war
news_text: Many of his friends have died, and he often sees traumatic events. The documentary 'Gaza: How to Survive a Warzone' follows Zakaria and other children living through the conflict. Despite the chaos, Zakaria dreams of becoming a paramedic, but he longs to escape the violence surrounding him.
